entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Risk of thundershowers early this evening. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
